description: Enhance GitIntegrationPanel to support user-selectable git repositories via folder picker, plus expanded git operations including branch management (list, create, switch, delete) and pull/push to remote.
goal: Allow users to select any git repository on their system and perform common git operations (status, commit, branch management, pull/push) from within the app.
requirements: User can select git repo via folder picker
Display current branch and repo status
Branch operations: list, create, switch, delete branches
